ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Back to good stuff, LOOT! and Levels!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just pulled this off of Everlore.  Looks like we were both right, Kit :) Guys, all the planes are going to get an item upgrade. Several other older dungeons
ygData.messageBody:
I just pulled this off of Everlore. Looks like we were both right, Kit :)

"Guys, all the planes are going to get an item upgrade.

Several other older dungeons are going to be revamped too.

FA style quests for every class are almost finished and in early testing
(the weapons look really cool, btw -- I was checking them out today).

And, rumor has it, the FA may very well be upgraded too.

As for Veeshan's Peak items, I'll bring up this issue at the next tuning
meeting.

thanks,

-Brad "

Someone is trying to ressurect your hopes_and_dreams. Do you accept?


Kyrisha



>
I think she was referring to the massive trade skill upgrades that are
underway. They look really cool, too bad my smith is a wood elf, sigh.
>

>A_kitasi_00 dashes YOUR hopes for 10000 points of non-melee damage.
>Your hopes_and_dreams have been slain!

>*sigh*

>Kyrisha

ROFLMAO!!! Sorry to cause you pain. Could be there is some tie-in between
the two though, and some of the new materials for smithing may be required
in the new weapon quests!

Kit

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
lol@... with the subject submissions.
